name: monarchmoney-mcp
description: Access your MonarchMoney personal finance data through Claude Desktop with natural language queries
author: Keith Ah <keithah@users.noreply.github.com>

tools.name: get_accounts
tools.description: Get all your MonarchMoney accounts (checking, savings, credit cards, investments, etc.)

tools.name: get_transactions
tools.description: Get transaction data with filtering options (date range, account, category, etc.)

tools.name: get_budgets
tools.description: Get your budget information and spending categories

tools.name: get_categories
tools.description: Get all transaction categories and subcategories

tools.name: get_cashflow_summary
tools.description: Get cashflow summary showing income vs expenses

tools.name: get_net_worth
tools.description: Get net worth data over time with date range options

examples: What's my current account balance across all accounts?
Show me my spending on restaurants this month
What's my net worth trend over the last year?
Which categories am I overspending in my budget?
Show me all transactions over $500 from last week

postInstall: echo 'Please configure your credentials in the Claude Desktop settings.'
